4  Practical Three

4.0.1 Setup

library(dplyr)

Attaching package: 'dplyr'
The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    filter, lag
The following objects are masked from 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
library(tidyr)

4.0.2 Displaying data in alternative form

4.0.3 Rewriting provided code

flights|>filter(month==1)|>group_by(carrier)|>summarise(meandist =mean(distance),stddist=sd(distance))|>arrange(meandist)
# A tibble: 16 × 3
   carrier meandist stddist
   <chr>      <dbl>   <dbl>
 1 YV          229      0  
 2 9E          476.   334. 
 3 EV          522.   294. 
 4 US          536.   553. 
 5 MQ          566.   223. 
 6 FL          691.   142. 
 7 OO          733     NA  
 8 WN          942.   496. 
 9 B6         1062.   681. 
10 DL         1220.   644. 
11 AA         1350.   626. 
12 UA         1462.   778. 
13 F9         1620      0  
14 AS         2402      0  
15 VX         2495.    98.2
16 HA         4983      0

4.0.4.1 The standard deviation is NA as there is only one value.

4.0.4.2 The standard deviation is 0 as all the values for a specific carrier are the same .An example would be HA the distance is 4983 for all therefore the standard deviation value is 0.

4.0.5 Constructing a dataframe  where the carriers are along the columns, and the rows are the average departure delay (dep_delay) flown by each carrier (carrier) in each month

new_df <- flights |> group_by(month,carrier) |> summarise(meandelay = mean(dep_delay,na.rm=TRUE)) |>pivot_wider(names_from=carrier,values_from = meandelay)
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'month'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
new_df
# A tibble: 12 × 17
# Groups:   month [12]

4.0.6 Proportion of flights that were delayed but arrived on time

filtered_fli <-flights |>filter(dep_delay>0&arr_delay<=0) 
filter_len <-nrow(filtered_fli)
original_len<-nrow(flights)
prop <- filter_len/original_len
prop
[1] 0.1052391

4.0.7 Routes that more than one airline flies

flights |> select(origin,dest,carrier)|>distinct() |>group_by(origin,dest) |> summarise(countc=n()) |>filter(countc>1)
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'origin'. You can override using the
`.groups` argument.
# A tibble: 128 × 3
# Groups:   origin [3]
   origin dest  countc
   <chr>  <chr>  <int>

 2 EWR    AUS        2
 3 EWR    BDL        2
 4 EWR    BNA        2
 5 EWR    BOS        3
 6 EWR    BWI        2
 7 EWR    CHS        2
 8 EWR    CLE        2
 9 EWR    CLT        3
10 EWR    CVG        2
# ℹ 118 more rows

4.0.8 Average arrival delay for each airline

meancalc<-flights|> select(origin,dest,carrier,arr_delay) |>group_by(origin,dest,carrier) |> summarise(meanarr = mean(arr_delay,na.rm=TRUE)) |> left_join(airlines,by= "carrier")
`summarise()` has grouped output by 'origin', 'dest'. You can override using
the `.groups` argument.
meancalc
# A tibble: 439 × 5
# Groups:   origin, dest [224]
   origin dest  carrier meanarr name                    
   <chr>  <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>                   
 1 EWR    ALB   EV        14.4  ExpressJet Airlines Inc.
 2 EWR    ANC   UA        -2.5  United Air Lines Inc.   
 3 EWR    ATL   9E        -6.25 Endeavor Air Inc.       
 4 EWR    ATL   DL        10.0  Delta Air Lines Inc.    
 5 EWR    ATL   EV        19.5  ExpressJet Airlines Inc.
 6 EWR    ATL   UA        10.5  United Air Lines Inc.   
 7 EWR    AUS   UA         4.28 United Air Lines Inc.   
 8 EWR    AUS   WN       -11.2  Southwest Airlines Co.  
 9 EWR    AVL   EV         8.80 ExpressJet Airlines Inc.
10 EWR    BDL   EV         6.78 ExpressJet Airlines Inc.
# ℹ 429 more rows

4.0.9 Worst and best average arrival delay

maxdelay <- max(meancalc$meanarr, na.rm = TRUE)
maxname <- meancalc |> filter(meanarr==maxdelay) 
maxname
# A tibble: 1 × 5
# Groups:   origin, dest [1]
  origin dest  carrier meanarr name                    
  <chr>  <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>                   
1 JFK    ATL   EV          128 ExpressJet Airlines Inc.
mindelay <- min(meancalc$meanarr, na.rm = TRUE)
minname <- meancalc |> filter(meanarr==mindelay)
minname
# A tibble: 1 × 5
# Groups:   origin, dest [1]
  origin dest  carrier meanarr name             
  <chr>  <chr> <chr>     <dbl> <chr>            
1 LGA    MSY   9E          -29 Endeavor Air Inc.

4.0.10 Reason for difference

4.0.10.1 A possible reason could be too many flights departing early and arriving late .
